changes.message: Request form: Added separate Livestream Archive field (required) and Channel Link field (optional)
Request cards: Always show field labels even when empty, expand icon always visible
Collection lightbox: Added safe-area support for mobile notch and bottom navigation bar
Collection lightbox: Fixed scrolling issue on mobile, images now properly resize to fit
Request section: Limited to ~3 rows with internal scrolling, no longer fills all available space
Adjusted LoRA/Prompt/Request card layout - Desktop shows ~10+ cards, tablet more, mobile fixed 3 per row; Request uses flex-wrap, sorted by date, Completed items moved to bottom with overlay
Fixed login issue in Request tab and height display issues
Added Request page - Submit LoRA requests, status filtering, Admin management features
Fixed album preview text display for video albums in Collection Gallery
Fixed user cache not updating album issue
Fixed admin authentication and video path issues in Collection Gallery
Renamed Gallery tab to Collection tab
Added Gallery (Collection) tab - Supports Static/Video/Story viewing modes
Added idol group filter
Added company filter
Fixed Statistics tab showing shared data for same character with different outfits
LoRA tab now supports multiple trained model result previews
Fixed Statistics tab hover prompt not showing
Fixed light hover background for Statistics tab
Added Statistics page - Displays LoRA and Prompt usage statistics
Support for multiple trained models per character LoRA
Fixed filter item count for single mode
Added usage guide for Prompt tab
Added Meta and stability marks for Prompt tab
Added filter for most downloaded and most copied
Added Character LoRA tab
Added Prompt filtering functionality
Added basic filter for Prompt Gallery
Initial project setup
